name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet grilled to perfection, seasoned with herbs and served with a side of roasted vegetables and lemon butter sauce.
recipeSteps: Marinate salmon in olive oil, lemon, and herbs for 30 minutes
Preheat grill to medium-high heat
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side
Prepare lemon butter sauce
Serve with roasted seasonal vegetables

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Arborio rice slowly cooked with wild mushrooms, white wine, and Parmesan cheese, finished with truffle oil and fresh herbs.
recipeSteps: Sauté mushrooms and onions until soft
Add Arborio rice and toast lightly
Gradually add warm broth while stirring
Fold in Parmesan cheese
Finish with truffle oil and fresh herbs

name: Spicy Thai Curry
description: Authentic Thai red curry with your choice of protein, bamboo shoots, bell peppers, and Thai basil, served with jasmine rice.
recipeSteps: Sauté curry paste in coconut milk
Add protein and cook until done
Add vegetables and simmer until tender
Stir in Thai basil
Serve hot with jasmine rice

name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in our housemade Caesar dressing, topped with garlic croutons, shaved Parmesan, and optional grilled chicken or shrimp.
recipeSteps: Wash and dry romaine lettuce leaves
Toss with housemade Caesar dressing
Add garlic croutons and shaved Parmesan
Finish with fresh ground pepper and lemon wedge

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla bean ice cream and fresh berries.
recipeSteps: Melt chocolate and butter together
Mix in other ingredients
Bake until edges are set but center is soft
Serve immediately with ice cream and berries
